question: who win road march in trinidad and tobago
vanilla_rag_result:
The Road March title in Trinidad and Tobago has been won by several artists. Notably:

- Lord Kitchener has the most wins with eleven titles.
- Super Blue and Machel Montano each have ten wins.
- The Mighty Sparrow has eight wins.
- Calypso Rose was the first female to win the Road March competition in 1977 and won again in 1978.
- Fay-Ann Lyons is a three-time champion, winning in 2003, 2008, and 2009.

These artists are among the prominent winners of the Trinidad and Tobago Road March title.
